name: Jason Yeh || Fundraising Processes and Insights

content.html: If you struggle to refine your story into 10-12 slides, I'd bet you're a solution looking for a problem Disagree? Post your deck and prove me wrong
content.value:
If you struggle to refine your story into 10-12 slides, I'd bet you're a solution looking for a problem 

Disagree? Post your deck and prove me wrong

content.html: My decks are regularly over 100 slides. Tell the story the way that works for you and your audience. What works for one person won’t for another. These made up rules compress your talent into someone else’s box. Build your own box. And then make it a platform.
content.value:
My decks are regularly over 100 slides.

Tell the story the way that works for you and your audience. What works for one person won’t for another. 

These made up rules compress your talent into someone else’s box. 

Build your own box. And then make it a platform.
